var resolve = require( 'path' ).resolve;
var proxyquire = require( 'proxyquire' );

var fpath = resolve( __dirname, '..', 'bin', 'cli' );

process.stdin.isTTY = false;

process.argv[ 2 ] = '--words=error';

proxyquire( fpath, {
	'@stdlib/process/read-stdin': stdin
});

function stdin( clbk ) {
	clbk( new Error( 'beep' ) );
}
